page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: The parish church at Chettle is united with that at Ashmore which shares its rector. The churches at Tarrant Hinton and Gunville are under the auspices of the incumbent in charge of all of the Tarrant Valley parishes, whose modern rectory is situated at Tarrant Hinton. There is a monthly rota of poorly attended services but a willing band of helpers (not all of whom attend services) turn up to clean the churches and form working paries for churchyard clearance etc. Tarrant Hinton is beautifully cared for by one devoted lady parishoner. Other branches of Christianity are represented and of other religions at least one buddist convert is recognised.
